title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Aircraft and ISR Capability

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build the capacity of the Kenyan Air Force Air Surveillance Detachment to conduct CT operations by providing an aerial ISR capability to significantly expand its ability to survey the border and monitor threats both in Kenya and against Kenyan military forces participating in AMISOM in Somalia. Equipment provided includes one STOL aircraft and one ISR camera ball.

description.narrative: Section 2282 Building Capacity of Foreign Security Forces programs (formerly known as Section 1206 Train and Equip), are intended to build partnership capacity for time-sensitive "new and emerging" counter-terrorist operations or to participate in or support military and stability operations in which the U.S. Armed Forces are a participant.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Special Operations Regiment CT Capability Enhancement

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build the capacity of the Kenyan Ranger Strike Force of the Kenyan Special Operations Regiment (KSOR) to conduct CT operations, including direct action missions and operations along the countrys borders. Equipment provided includes vehicles, radios, laptops, night vision devices, weapons, ammunition, organizational clothing and individual equipment, and medical supplies.

title.narrative: Counterterrorism Partnerships Fund (CTPF) - CT Operations and Training Capability

description.narrative: The Counterterrorism Partnerships Fund (CTPF) supports a sustainable and partnership-focused approach to counterterrorism with a flexible mechanism that allows the Department of Defense (DoD) to respond more nimbly to evolving terrorist threats from South Asia to the Sahel. The CTPF builds on existing tools and authorities to respond to a range of terrorist threats by providing direct support to partner nations as well as augmenting U.S. capability to support partners in counterterrorism (CT) operations.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - CIED Enhancement (2282 T2)

description.narrative: This program will provide the KDF with a C-IED capability to bolster effectiveness and reduce risk to Kenyan forces deployed in support of AMISOM. This program requires a DTSA waiver for NVGs.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Intelligence Company (FY15 CTPF)

description.narrative: This program will provide communications articles and operational services on military intelligence and network analysis, enhancing the Kenyan militarys ability to target terrorists operating within Kenya in addition to supporting AMISOM operations.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Ranger Regiment (FY15 CTPF)

description.narrative: This program continues the development of Kenyan SOF by establishing an organic support and transportation element within the KRR to provide combat services and support of SOF forces deployed to AMISOM. (Requires DTSA waiver)
